title: hi, Please add default call recording on Google Pixel Mobile (4A).It is very necessary&pls help me.
content:
Hi, 
              I need to buy the google pixel 4A (5G), but it hasn't arrived yet in India. I have to know one thing about Pixel mobiles.Is there any option could be available for default call recording on Google Pixel 4A?. Additionally can you help me out for this issue to get default call recording service on mobile. I really love the pixel 4A and it is very necessary to have a default call recording.
Thank you
